name: Melody blooms
description:
Last audiovisual in which this musical work is completed. Before I said there would be three, but as everything mutates, so do my decisions.

Audio recorded in 2019; set of guitars recorded analogically with the microphone of a webcam; there are no few resources when there is a desire to explore.

And a micro poem as a gift: 

The melody blossoms, the circle is completed. 
A long way, a walk
life is short for me
